content: layering for style comes effortlessly with this crochet top that s sure to become a summer essential worked in cool caron all day cotton and a nautically-inspired airy mesh stitch the body is made in one piece with the sleeves crocheted separately and seamed into place practice doing a mesh pattern in double_crochet and chain-1 spaces with single_crochet edging wear it open or button it up for this breezy garment that anyone can wear materials caron® all day cotton™ 3 5 oz/100 g 173 yds/158 m sizes xs/s/m l/xl 2/3xl 4/5xl jute 00003 5 6 7 8 balls gauges 20 sts double_crochet and chain-1 sps and 7 row = 4 10 cm in mesh pat 15 single_crochet and 18 row = 4 10 cm sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s/m 28-38 71-96 5 cm l/xl 40-46 101 5-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm
